title: Youth held over killing friend for iPhone
body: The body of a youth was recovered at Bianibazar upazila in Sylhet on Wednesday morning, three days after he went missing. The deceased, Emon Ahmed, 22, is son of Mutlib Miah of Khasirnam Nagar village at Kurarbazar union under the Bianibazar upazila, police said. The police arrested Emon’s friend Ashraful, 23, for his alleged involvement in the killing. Relatives of the victim told reporters that Ashraful had taken Emon out from his house on Sunday morning and since then he remained missing. Beanibazar police station officer-in-charge Md Omar Faruk told New Age that the body of Emon was recovered, with his hands and feet tied, from the bank of a pond of a fishery farm at Kona Shaleswar village under Shewla union of the upazila. ‘Significant information regarding the incident of snatching Emon’s iPhone 15 Pro and killing him was extracted from Ashraful during the primary interrogation,’ he said in the afternoon, adding that interrogation was under way. The police officer also said that the body of Emon was sent to Sylhet Osmani Medical College Hospital for a post-mortem examination.
